suite.name: script_001_Validate component dependencies for 161771000036108 |Australian common module|

test.name: 05 OWL Axioms for concepts on Australian common module must be on modules that are dependent Australian common module

parameter.name: query

test.name: 06 OWL Axioms on Australian common module must be for concepts on modules Australian common module dependens on

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.owlexpressionrefset_<SNAPSHOT> where moduleId = 161771000036108 and referencedComponentId not in (select id from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_<SNAPSHOT> where moduleId in (select referencedComponentId from rf2_cr_ssrefset_snapshot where active and moduleId = 161771000036108 UNION select 161771000036108 ) );

test.name: 07 Inferred relationships sourceId from Australian common module only depends on concepts from modules Australian common module depends on

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_<SNAPSHOT> where sourceId in (select id from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_<SNAPSHOT> where moduleId = 161771000036108) and destinationId not in (select id from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_<SNAPSHOT> where moduleId in (select referencedComponentId from rf2_cr_ssrefset_snapshot where active and moduleId = 161771000036108 UNION select 161771000036108));

test.name: 08 Inferred Relationships for concepts on Australian common module must be on modules that are dependent Australian common module

parameter.name: query

test.name: 09 Inferred Relationships on Australian common module must be for sourceIds from modules Australian common module dependens on

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_<SNAPSHOT> where moduleId = 161771000036108 and sourceId not in (select id from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_<SNAPSHOT> where moduleId in (select referencedComponentId from rf2_cr_ssrefset_snapshot where active and moduleId = 161771000036108 UNION select 161771000036108 ) );

test.name: 10 Inferred Relationships on Australian common module must be for destinationIds from modules Australian common module dependens on

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_<SNAPSHOT> where moduleId = 161771000036108 and destinationId not in (select id from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_<SNAPSHOT> where moduleId in (select referencedComponentId from rf2_cr_ssrefset_snapshot where active and moduleId = 161771000036108 UNION select 161771000036108 ) );

test.name: 11 Descriptions for concepts on Australian common module must be on modules that are dependent Australian common module, excluding concepts previously on dependent modules.

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.descriptions_<SNAPSHOT> where conceptId in (select id from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_<SNAPSHOT> where moduleId = 161771000036108) and moduleId not in (select moduleId from rf2_cr_ssrefset_snapshot where active and referencedComponentId = 161771000036108 UNION select 161771000036108) and conceptId not in (select distinct id from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_<FULL> where id in (select id from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_<SNAPSHOT> where moduleId = 161771000036108) and moduleId != 161771000036108 and moduleId in (select referencedComponentId from rf2_cr_ssrefset_snapshot where active and moduleId = 161771000036108));

test.name: 12 Descriptions on Australian common module must be for concepts that Australian common module depends on

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.descriptions_<SNAPSHOT> where moduleId = 161771000036108 and conceptId not in (select id from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_<SNAPSHOT> where moduleId in (select referencedComponentId from rf2_cr_ssrefset_snapshot where active and moduleId = 161771000036108 UNION select 161771000036108));

test.name: 13 ADRS Language preferences for descriptions on Australian common module must be on modules that are dependent Australian common module

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.langrefset_<SNAPSHOT> where refsetId = 900000000000506000 and referencedComponentId in (select id from <PROSPECTIVE>.descriptions_<SNAPSHOT> where moduleId = 161771000036108) and moduleId not in (select moduleId from rf2_cr_ssrefset_snapshot where active and referencedComponentId = 161771000036108 UNION select 161771000036108);

test.name: 14 ADRS Language preferences on Australian common module must be for descriptions on modules Australian common module dependens on

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.langrefset_<SNAPSHOT> where moduleId = 161771000036108 and refsetId = 900000000000506000 and referencedComponentId not in (select id from <PROSPECTIVE>.descriptions_<SNAPSHOT> where moduleId in (select moduleId from rf2_cr_ssrefset_snapshot where active and referencedComponentId = 161771000036108 UNION select 161771000036108));

parameter.name: query

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.langrefset_<SNAPSHOT> where referencedComponentId in (select id from <PROSPECTIVE>.descriptions_<SNAPSHOT> where moduleId = 161771000036108) and moduleId not in (select moduleId from rf2_cr_ssrefset_snapshot where active and referencedComponentId = 161771000036108 UNION select 161771000036108) and referencedComponentId not in (select distinct id from <PROSPECTIVE>.descriptions_<FULL> where id in (select id from <PROSPECTIVE>.descriptions_<SNAPSHOT> where moduleId = 161771000036108) and moduleId != 161771000036108 and moduleId in (select referencedComponentId from rf2_cr_ssrefset_snapshot where active and moduleId = 161771000036108));

parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.langrefset_<SNAPSHOT> where moduleId = 161771000036108 and referencedComponentId in (select id from <PROSPECTIVE>.descriptions_<SNAPSHOT>) and referencedComponentId not in ( select id from <PROSPECTIVE>.descriptions_<SNAPSHOT> where moduleId in (select referencedComponentId from rf2_cr_ssrefset_snapshot where active and moduleId = 161771000036108 UNION select 161771000036108));
